gameguide.gameguide.intro: Risk Reforged is a game about conquering cities and ports across Europe. Win conditions vary depending on what game mode has been chosen, but what is common among all modes is that you have to capture 60% of all cities.
gameguide.gameguide.followup: The following sections will help you familiarise yourself with the basic concepts and help you get on your way to dominate Europe in no time!

standalone.standalone.title: STAND ALONE
standalone.standalone.text: This is a showcase and a trailer for the game that is currently in development!
standalone.standalone.subtitleHeader: The evolution of classic rts begins now
standalone.standalone.description:
The legacy of one of WarCraft III’s most iconic custom maps is being reborn. Bigger. Smarter. Stand-alone.

Welcome to Stand Alone, a simplified, yet fiercely competitive real-time strategy (RTS) game inspired by the legendary Risk map from WarCraft III — and built from the ground up as a dedicated multiplayer experience. Set during the turbulent age of the Napoleonic Wars, this is a battlefield where tactics, trust, and timing mean everything.
standalone.standalone.following: Support us now on Kickstarter and help bring Stand Alone to life — a new home for the RTS community, forged in strategy and fire.

standaloneSegments.title: Not convinced yet?
standaloneSegments.intro: Let’s break it down. Stand Alone is made for players who crave:
standaloneSegments.point1: Big multiplayer battles – Up to 24 players in a single match. Alliances form and shatter in real time.
standaloneSegments.point2: Strategic depth without micromanagement – Focus on what matters: gold, territory, trust, and timing.
standaloneSegments.point3: Epic free-for-alls on a handcrafted European map filled with iconic cities and chokepoints.
standaloneSegments.point4: Dynamic diplomacy – Backstab or be backstabbed. Nothing is permanent but your ambition.
standaloneSegments.point5: A game with roots in the past and vision for the future – Designed by fans of the original WarCraft III Risk, refined for today’s gamers.

standaloneFooter.title: Join our efforts
standaloneFooter.description: Support us now on Kickstarter and help bring Stand Alone to life — a new home for the RTS community, forged in strategy and fire.

content.question: What is Risk Reforged?
content.answer: Risk Reforged is a community-driven project to maintain and expand the Risk map genre within Warcraft III.

content.question: How can I contribute?
content.answer: Join our Discord to collaborate, test, and share ideas.

content.question: Is this project affiliated with Blizzard?
content.answer: No. This is a fan-made project and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Blizzard Entertainment.
